pullRequest.title: Initial transaction implementation for DB2
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #493
By default, DB2 flows the "commit" (RDBCMM) command after each SQL UPDATE statement, which is effectively JDBC auto-commit behavior. To account for DB2's implicit transactions I had to add a boolean autoCommit() method to the internal ExtendedQuery and SimpleQuery commands, so that the codec implementations can know whether or not they should be flowing an auto-commit after UPDATE statements.
Also CC @mswatosh for review

beforeCommit.message: Handle BEGIN special case in only DB2 instead of common layer
